Activity.description: executes a defined process block within the workflow
Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED"))
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_failiure_message});
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

<inputs><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_PAUSE_WF_START class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_PAUSE_WF_START}</INP_PAUSE_WF_START><INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE}</INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE><INP_LOG_SEVERITY class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_LOG_SEVERITY}</INP_LOG_SEVERITY><INP_SEND_EMAIL class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false" /><INP_CHECK class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_CHECK></inputs>

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="if (xpath:{/workflow/Clean_2/commandOutput}.equals("Request successful.") && xpath:{/workflow/Clean_2/exitCode} == 0)
{
 return true;
}
else
{
 return false;
}" /></inputs>
